Reviews.Title: super
Reviews.Author: F. W "tech"
Reviews.Content: Installed several security systems for different occasions. This package is definitely the best! Compared with the CMOS kits I've installed, this CCD camera give me the REAL color. The DVR 's interface is user friendly and easy to use. As usual, called Zmodo support line for the remote access setup part. Downloaded the Zviewer app for my iPhone, works perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Really good system for a home
Reviews.Author: Altros
Reviews.Content: I set this system up after having some vandalism on my property. The picture is pretty good. I covered my entire property with the 4 cameras and they provide me with peace of mind. I thought the picture was going to be crummy, but I was definitely amazed at the quality. Of course, it is not high end, but looks damn good for the price. The DVR works great and it is pretty easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Zmodo Complete 4CH DVR Security Surveillance Camera System
Reviews.Author: Daniel Bender "Daniel Bender"
Reviews.Content: The DVR works great. The cameras are good for a "KIT" system, but if you want to see faces farther that 10 feet you'll need to buy better cameras. 99% of CCTV cameras are compatible with this system.

Reviews.Title: zmodo cameras
Reviews.Author: paul feider
Reviews.Content: easy to instill and hook up.... but hard to program.  spent about 3 hours on live chat with zmodo customer service..they were very help full...

Reviews.Title: Exellent quality for a fair price!
Reviews.Author: Reynaldo Sedena
Reviews.Content: Good video quality and super easy to install! I would recommend this product! this is my first time to purchase a cctv,but it never disappoint me.good reviews and excellent quality!

ProductInfo.Features:
Support Remote View: PC & 3G/4G Mobile
500GB Hard Drive Installed - Supports up to 2TB HD
BNC & VGA output
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo Complete 4CH DVR Security Surveillance Camera System 4 IR Outdoor CCTV Video Black Camera - 500GB Hard Drive
